data.taskTitle: Port JAT workflow commands to Pi coding agent skill format
Port JAT workflow commands to Pi coding agent skill format
data.approach: Create Pi skills for jat-start and jat-complete using SKILL.md format (agentskills.io standard). Create AGENTS.md with full JAT instructions. Pi has native bash so all jat tools (am-send, bd, jat-signal) work directly. Skills will be installed to ~/.pi/agent/skills/. Also create Pi prompt templates for the workflow commands.

data.taskTitle: Port JAT workflow commands to Pi coding agent skill format
summary: Created 3 Pi skills (jat-start, jat-complete, jat-verify) in Agent Skills standard SKILL.md format
Rewrote AGENTS.md with comprehensive JAT Layer 2 instructions (Agent Mail, Beads, signals, session lifecycle)
Created install-pi-skills.sh that symlinks skills to ~/.pi/agent/skills/
Integrated Pi skills install into main install.sh as optional step
Updated CLAUDE.md project structure to document skills/ directory
reviewFocus: SKILL.md format compliance with agentskills.io spec
AGENTS.md coverage of JAT Layer 2 concepts
